name: beeminder
description: Access to the user's Beeminder goals
long_description: Beeminder is a goal-tracking service that uses financial incentives to help users stay committed to their objectives. Users can set goals for anything that can be measured, such as weight, exercise frequency, or time spent on specific activities. Beeminder integrates with many services for automatic data entry. https://www.beeminder.com/

tools.name: record_progress
tools.description: Add a Datapoint to a beeminder goal and receive updated goal status

tools.name: record_progress_for_yesterday
tools.description: Add a datapoint to a Beeminder goal on yesterday's date and receive updated goal status

tools.name: list_goals
tools.description: Get a complete list of the user's Beeminder goals with current status for effort prioritization
